response.overview: "Life's a boulevard and sometimes you get stuck." This fictional documentary is a day-in-the-life tale about the edgy East Coast hotshot real estate attorney turned modern-day yoga master, Bobby D'Angelo. After losing his wife, D'Angelo goes through a drastic career and lifestyle change. He discovers the power of yoga and uses its principles to help him cope with his daily struggles while inspiring others to overcome their challenges.
response.title: Boulevard Zen
